meanings.sent1: The ruler was unbending, unable to bend even a little.
meanings.sent2: The metal rod remained unbending despite the strong wind.
meanings.sent3: The unbending tree refused to sway even when the storm howled around it.
meanings.sent4: Her unbending determination was like a solid rock in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The unbending steel beam held the entire structure together with unwavering strength.

meanings.definition: Firm or resolute in purpose or will
meanings.sent1: His unbending belief in justice guided all his actions.
meanings.sent2: She showed her unbending resolve to finish the marathon despite the pain.
meanings.sent3: The unbending attitude of the cat demanding treats was both cute and stubborn.
meanings.sent4: The mountain stood unbending, a symbol of endurance and determination.
meanings.sent5: His unbending loyalty to his friends never wavered, no matter the circumstances.
